com.emmes.aps

Class ReminderActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.content.Context
      • android.content.ContextWrapper
        • android.view.ContextThemeWrapper
          • android.app.Activity
            • com.emmes.aps.ReminderActivity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.ComponentCallbacks2, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory2, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, android.view.Window.Callback

    public class ReminderActivity
extends android.app.Activity
    An example full-screen activity that shows and hides the system UI (i.e. status bar and navigation/system bar) with user interaction.
    See Also:
    SystemUiHider

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static boolean AUTO_HIDE
      Whether or not the system UI should be auto-hidden after AUTO_HIDE_DELAY_MILLIS milliseconds.
      private static int AUTO_HIDE_DELAY_MILLIS
      If AUTO_HIDE is set, the number of milliseconds to wait after user interaction before hiding the system UI.
      private static int HIDER_FLAGS
      The flags to pass to SystemUiHider.getInstance(android.app.Activity, android.view.View, int).
      (package private) android.view.View.OnTouchListener mDelayHideTouchListener
      Touch listener to use for in-layout UI controls to delay hiding the system UI.
      (package private) android.os.Handler mHideHandler 
      (package private) java.lang.Runnable mHideRunnable 
      private SystemUiHider mSystemUiHider
      The instance of the SystemUiHider for this activity.
      protected static java.lang.String TAG 
      private static boolean TOGGLE_ON_CLICK
      If set, will toggle the system UI visibility upon interaction.

    • Field Detail

      • AUTO_HIDE

        private static final boolean AUTO_HIDE
        Whether or not the system UI should be auto-hidden after AUTO_HIDE_DELAY_MILLIS milliseconds.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • AUTO_HIDE_DELAY_MILLIS

        private static final int AUTO_HIDE_DELAY_MILLIS
        If AUTO_HIDE is set, the number of milliseconds to wait after user interaction before hiding the system UI.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • TOGGLE_ON_CLICK

        private static final boolean TOGGLE_ON_CLICK
        If set, will toggle the system UI visibility upon interaction. Otherwise, will show the system UI visibility upon interaction.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • HIDER_FLAGS

        private static final int HIDER_FLAGS
        The flags to pass to SystemUiHider.getInstance(android.app.Activity, android.view.View, int).
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • TAG

        protected static final java.lang.String TAG
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • mSystemUiHider

        private SystemUiHider mSystemUiHider
        The instance of the SystemUiHider for this activity.

      • mDelayHideTouchListener

        android.view.View.OnTouchListener mDelayHideTouchListener
        Touch listener to use for in-layout UI controls to delay hiding the system UI. This is to prevent the jarring behavior of controls going away while interacting with activity UI.

      • mHideHandler

        android.os.Handler mHideHandler

      • mHideRunnable

        java.lang.Runnable mHideRunnable
